text: The 2011 British Formula Ford Championship was the 36th edition of the British Formula Ford Championship. It commenced on 9 April at the Silverstone National Circuit and ended on 9 October at Silverstone Arena Circuit after 8 rounds and 24 races, all held in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands. ==Drivers and teams== {| | {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! R3 | Geoff Uhrhane | Scott Malvern | Jeroen Slaghekke | Jamun Racing |} ==Championship standings== In the Championship Class, points were awarded on a 30-27-24-22-20-18-16-14-12-10-8-6-4-3-2 basis to the top fifteen classified drivers, with one point awarded to all other finishers. In the Scholarship Class, points were awarded 30-27-24-22-20-18-16-14-12-10-8-6-4-2-1 basis. An additional point was given to the driver who set the fastest lap in each race, in both classes. ===Drivers' Championships=== {| | {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center;" |-
